meanings.definition: A hydrocarbon with the formula C8H18, found in petroleum and used as a fuel additive.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic recommended using octanes to improve the car's performance.
meanings.sent2: Gasoline contains octanes to make it burn more efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The octanes in the fuel tank decided to have a race to see who could reach the engine first.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the octanes propelling the car forward.
meanings.sent5: The smell of octanes lingered in the air after refueling at the gas station.
